name: Ralf Lämmel
content: Ralf Lämmel (Prof. Dr.) - SOFTLANG Team, Uni Koblenz-Landau SOFTLANG Team, Uni Koblenz-Landau Home Members Activities Teaching Theses Contact News Create account or Sign in Ralf Lämmel (Prof. Dr.) I am Professor in Computer Science at University of Koblenz Landau. I lead the SoftLang team. Currently, I am dean of the faculty. Recently, I was engineer in R&D at Facebook. In the past, I have worked in academia and industry in NL, UK, and USA. Overall, I am interested in: software/data engineering, programming/software/domain-specific/modeling languages, software language engineering, mining software repositories and systems and IT companies, and machine learning, data mining, process mining in all those contexts.
